alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 3:52PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT WESTERN BOX ELDER AND WESTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 351 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Montello to 16 miles east of Lages Junction...and moving east at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Park Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Ibapah, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Etna, Standrod, Grouse Creek, Lynn, Bonneville Salt Flats, Lucin, Rosette and Yost. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 52. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 1 and 64. * strong winds in excess of 45 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
